summary: Tired of getting that annoying error in Wrye Bash? Replace the wizard.txt with this one.
descriptionHtml: So I saw that a few people were having the same problem as me in the XP32 Maximum Skeleton "Posts" tab, and this is for them. All credits go to xp32 and whoever made the BAIN Installer. Also, I know nothing about editing wizards. I decided to have a look and noticed that there seemed to be a pattern with ",\" and that line 21 should have those two characters.
author: gutlessVADER

files.name: The best wizard evurr - get this one
